title: Mixed Nuts (1994) Steve Martin widescreen stereo DVDrip
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0110538/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0110538/</a>

One of my favourite Steve Martin comedies, where he works at a crisis hotline service on one crazy night during the Christmas holidays. You have hardly ever seen such a collection of crazy people.

Look out for Madeline Kahn as Mrs. Munchnik ('I have never been young!') who was Lili von Shtupp in Mel Brooks' 'Blazing Saddles'.
And Liev Schreiber as a convincing transvestite, later to establish himself as an action hero.
And a very young Adam Sandler playing the ukulele, already a clown.
And Rita Wilson, stepmother of Colin Hanks, as the neurotic Catherine.

I was surprised not to find it here on PirateBay. This is not my rip, it's an old one from my collection, but I ran it through Dr. DivX with 'Extreme Quality' to polish it a little.

Burn tested, runs well in my DivX player.
